statements: SELECT * FROM products
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM products
SELECT id, name FROM products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'Apple%'
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT name, id FROM products WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM products
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity AS stock FROM products WHERE quantity < 10
SELECT * FROM products WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM Products;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM Warehouses;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, w.location, i.quantity FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM Products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name;

SELECT product_name, warehouse_name, quantity FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE warehouse_name LIKE 'Warehouse A%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT p.product_name AS product, w.location AS warehouse_location, i.quantity AS available_quantity FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE available_quantity > 10 ORDER BY available_quantity DESC, product;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;

SELECT products.name, warehouses.location, products_warehouses.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN products_warehouses ON products.id = products_warehouses.product_id INNER JOIN warehouses ON products_warehouses.warehouse_id = warehouses.id WHERE products_warehouses.quantity > 10;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products_warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 1;

SELECT products.name AS product_name, warehouses.name AS warehouse_name, alerts.alert_message FROM products INNER JOIN alerts ON products.id = alerts.product_id INNER JOIN warehouses ON alerts.warehouse_id = warehouses.id WHERE alerts.expiration_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inventory FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_inventory DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT warehouse_location, quantity FROM warehouses INNER JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id;
SELECT product_name, warehouse_location, transaction_date FROM products INNER JOIN transactions ON products.product_id = transactions.product_id;
SELECT product_name, warehouse_location, alert_type FROM products INNER JOIN alerts ON products.product_id = alerts.product_id AND alerts.alert_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY warehouse_location DESC;
